name: Sea Scallop Ceviche
keywords: appetizer, chives, lime juice, plum tomato, red bell pepper, red onion, sea scallop, seafood
recipeIngredient: 3 ripe plum tomatoes, seeded and diced
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
1 small red bell pepper, seeded, deveined and finely chopped
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Slice scallops horizontally 1/2 inch thick. Cover, and refrigerate. In a small bowl, sprinkle tomatoes with salt and refrigerate. Combine red onion, garlic, jalapeno pepper, bell pepper, olive oil and lime juice in a bowl. Refrigerate.

About an hour before serving, drain liquid off tomatoes and add to onion mixture. Fold in chives and cilantro. Add scallops, and toss. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Allow to marinate about 30 minutes, then serve.
